#summary Overview of some special operators defined in Snow

== Introduction ===
Snow defines some special operators which are outlined in this document.

== 'Apply' operator (`*`) ==
The apply operator tells the parser to apply a function to some variable.

=== Definition ===

{{{
function(*variable)
*variable->function()
}}}

=== Examples ===

=== 1) ===
Introduction example one.
{{{
ar1 = ["el1" "el2"]
ar2 = ["el3" "el4"]
*ar1->array_merge(ar2)
}}}
Output:
{{{
# ar1 == ["el1" "el2" "el3" "el4"]
}}}
